about.content:
I am a Research Scientist at UniMORE (University of Modena and Reggio Emilia), Department of Engineering "Enzo Ferrari", focusing on the application of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning to challenging problems in process and supply chain optimization.

In December 2023, I obtained the ASN (Abilitazione Scientifica Nazionale), qualifying me for the position of Associate Professor in Industrial Mechanical Systems.

My research is currently funded through the ECOSISTER project (PNRR - National Recovery and Resilience Plan), Spoke 3 "Green manufacturing for a sustainable economy", developing innovative data-driven and lean-based solutions for sustainable production planning and control systems.

Beyond research, I am a proficient Full-stack Developer, leveraging Python, JavaScript, and SQL to build state-of-the-art business web applications and deliver value through pragmatic application of cutting-edge machine learning techniques.
